title: unknown error
body: so i was in on the home page, then i got a popup saying unknown error. its still popping up. help.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client may have been trying to load specific content from the servers and encountering troubles. If you're still seeing this error, I recommend checking out our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it should assist you in resolving this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
